pkgmetadata.longdescription: Code Sharing at the Department of Epidemiological Research at Statens Serum Institut // This is a collection of assorted functions and examples collected from various projects. Currently we have functionalities for simplifying overlapping time intervals, Charlson comorbidity score constructors for Danish data, getting frequency for multiple variables, getting standardized output from logistic and log-linear regressions, sibling design linear regression functionalities a method for calculating the confidence intervals for functions of parameters from a GLM, Bayes equivalent for hypothesis testing with asymptotic Bayes factor, and several help functions for generalized random forest analysis using 'grf'.
